dialogue.User: I would like you to set the trigger channel to Department of Agriculture.
I'd like to get notified when there’s a food safety issue.

dialogue.System: Ok, I understand you want a notification about food safety issues. To set this up, could you tell me what specifically triggers this notification from the Department of Agriculture?
dialogue.User: I need to be notified when the Department of Agriculture announces a new open recall. Also, please send me an email when that happens.
I would like you to play music.
I would like information from Weather Underground.
Can you tell me if there's anything new happening with the weather?

dialogue.System: Ok, I understand you want to share updates on Twitter. But where are these updates coming from? Could you tell me which source should trigger this action?
dialogue.User: The updates come from my RSS feed. So, monitor any new item in my RSS feed and then post a tweet with the image.
I'd like to get notified when something new happens with agricultural data.

dialogue.System: Ok, I understand you want an email notification about agricultural data. Could you tell me what specifically about that data triggers this notification?
dialogue.User: Notify me when new subsidy programs are announced by the Department of Agriculture.

I want to receive today’s weather report.

I would like you to post on Twitter.
I'd like to get notified when something happens.

dialogue.User: Please send me an email with the link to the post and the hashtag used.
I’d like something to happen when my cooking app starts up, and send a notification to my phone.

dialogue.User: The trigger is happening within the Cookit app. And I’d like to send the notification to my Android Device.
I want to receive tomorrow’s weather report via email.

dialogue.System: Ok, I understand you want to post a tweet with an image when a new photo is posted on Facebook with a hashtag. But what details should be included in the tweet itself?
dialogue.User: The tweet should include the text from the original Facebook post and also the same image that was uploaded.
I’d like to be notified whenever the Department of Agriculture issues a new open recall.
I'd like something to happen when I get a notification on my phone.

dialogue.System: Ok, so you want music to play when you receive a notification. Can you tell me more about what triggers this action? What event on your phone should start the music?
dialogue.User: When I get a new message on my Android Device, I'd like to play music.

dialogue.System: Ok, I understand you want a weather update for tomorrow. But from where do you want me to get this information?
dialogue.User: The trigger channel is 'Weather Channel', and the trigger title is 'Tomorrow's weather report'.

dialogue.System: You mentioned being notified about food recalls. To ensure I can deliver relevant information, could you tell me more specifically what kind of recall you are interested in?
dialogue.User: I want to be notified when the Department of Agriculture announces a new open recall with query 'Frozen Strawberries - Potential Listeria Contamination'.

dialogue.System: So, when a new open recall matching 'Frozen Strawberries - Potential Listeria Contamination' is announced by the Department of Agriculture, how would you like to be notified?
dialogue.User: I want to receive an email notification.

dialogue.System: Great! Now that you’ve chosen email notification, could you tell me anything specific about what information you'd like included in the email? Perhaps a subject or any details for the body?
dialogue.User: I just want to be informed as soon as possible when there is a recall.

'

dialogue.System: Great! So we're set up to trigger when a cooking program finishes on your Home Connect Cookit. Now, regarding the specific kitchen ID, can you tell me which kitchen this applies to?

dialogue.System: Now that we've chosen Gmail, could you please provide the recipient email addresses, subject and body for the email you want to send? Also, do you have any attachments you’d like to include with a link to its URL?
dialogue.User:
I would like to send an email to john.doe@example.com with the subject 'Tomorrow's Weather in Los Angeles' and the body '

Hi John,

Just wanted to let you know the weather forecast for tomorrow in Los Angeles:

Expect sunny skies with a high of 75°F and a low of 60°F.

Have a great day!

' and attach the file available at https://www.example.com/weather_report.pdf. I will not add anyone in Cc or Bcc.

dialogue.User: I'd like to get notified when the Department of Agriculture issues a new open recall with Query “Frozen Strawberries - Potential Listeria Contamination”.

dialogue.System: Now that I'm monitoring for new open recalls from the Department of Agriculture regarding "Frozen Strawberries - Potential Listeria Contamination", how would you like to be notified?
dialogue.User: I would like to receive these notifications via Email.

dialogue.System: Great! Now that you've chosen Email as the notification channel, what would you like the subject line and body of the email to be?
dialogue.User: I would like the subject line and body of the email to say "Send me an email".

dialogue.System: Okay, now that we’ve defined the email notification, could you tell me what subject and content you would like included in the email?
dialogue.User: I want a simple alert message to be sent.

dialogue.System: You mentioned a simple alert message. To ensure the notification is clear, could you provide the exact subject and body text for this alert?
dialogue.User:
The subject should be 'Recall Alert: Frozen Strawberries' and the body should be '

Dear Recipient,

The Department of Agriculture has issued a recall for frozen strawberries due to potential Listeria contamination. Please see the attached link for more details and safety instructions.

Sincerely,
Department of Agriculture Recall Notification System

'.

Belief State.action_fields: Subject (Text input > Title), Body (Text input > HTML)
Belief State.action_fields_values:
'Recall Alert: Frozen Strawberries', '

Dear Recipient,

The Department of Agriculture has issued a recall for frozen strawberries due to potential Listeria contamination. Please see the attached link for more details and safety instructions.

Sincerely,
Department of Agriculture Recall Notification System

'

dialogue.User: I'd like something to happen when my cooking app starts, and send a notification to my phone.

dialogue.System: Ok, so you want a notification on your phone when the app starts. What about the source of this event? Where does it happen?
dialogue.User: The event happens within the Cookit app and I'd like to send a notification to my Android Device.

dialogue.System: Great! Now that we’ve established the trigger and destination, how do you want this music to play on your Android Device? Do you have any preferences for volume or playlist?
dialogue.User: Just start playing something upbeat when Cookit starts. I don't really care about the details right now.

dialogue.System: Ok, so you want some music to play when Cookit starts. But on which device do you want this to happen? And what about the music source – Spotify, Apple Music, or something else?
dialogue.User: I want it to play on my Android Device using Spotify. The action title is 'Play music'.

dialogue.System: Great! Now that we've set up music playback on Spotify through your Android device when Cookit starts, is there anything else I can help you configure for this action?
dialogue.User: No, that’s all for now. Thanks!

dialogue.System: So we're setting up a trigger based on your Home Connect Cookit. What specific ID within your kitchen would you like this trigger to apply to?
dialogue.User: I want to use the Kitchen ID number 12345.
I'd like to get an email when something happens with the weather.

dialogue.System: Considering you want an email notification related to weather, could you specify what kind of weather event should trigger this?
dialogue.User: I’d like to get an email when there is a new severe weather alert from Weather Underground. Also, send it to my Gmail account.

dialogue.System: Great! Now that we've set up the trigger from Weather Underground and the destination as Gmail, what would you like the subject line of this email to be?
dialogue.User: Please use “Severe Weather Alert” as the subject line for the email sent via Gmail.

dialogue.System: Okay, now that we know the email subject is “Severe Weather Alert”, and it will be sent via Gmail, do you want to specify who should receive this email, and if you would like to add any attachments?
dialogue.User: Yes, I’d like to send it to my team. Perhaps a link to the detailed report would be useful.

dialogue.System: Okay, so you want to send this report to your team. Could you tell me *who* exactly is on your team, and if you have specific addresses for each recipient? Also, regarding the attachment, can you provide the complete URL?
dialogue.User:
The recipients are john.doe@example.com, jane.smith@example.com and peter.jones@example.com. The subject will be “Tomorrow’s Weather in Los Angeles” and the body is

Hi John,

Just wanted to let you know the weather forecast for tomorrow in Los Angeles:

Expect sunny skies with a high of 75°F and a low of 60°F.

Have a great day!

. The attachment URL is https://www.example.com/weather_report.pdf. I will not add Cc or Bcc recipients.

Belief State.action_fields: To (Text input > Other), Cc (Text input > Other), Bcc (Text input > Other), Subject (Text input > Title), Body (Text input > HTML), Attachment URL (Text input > File)

Just wanted to let you know the weather forecast for tomorrow in Los Angeles:

Expect sunny skies with a high of 75°F and a low of 60°F.

Have a great day!

', 'https://www.example.com/weather_report.pdf'

dialogue.System: Considering you've provided details for sending the weather report – recipients, subject, body and attachment – and knowing that this is triggered by receiving 'Tomorrow's weather report', do you have any preferences on *when* you’d like me to send it?
dialogue.User: I think immediately after I receive the report would be fine. Perhaps around noon?

dialogue.User: The trigger channel is 'Weather Channel'. So, monitor 'Tomorrow’s weather report' on 'Weather Channel'.

dialogue.User: I want to receive notifications based on weather updates from Weather Underground.

dialogue.System: Considering you want a notification from the IFTTT app when weather updates are available, how would you like to customize the message content?
dialogue.User: Just send me something simple when it rains.

dialogue.System: Okay, so you want a simple notification when it rains. But what specific information about the rain would you like included in that message? For example, do you want to know the intensity or duration?
dialogue.User: I'd like the notification to say ''☀️ Good morning! Today in London, it\'s going to be sunny with a high of 25°C. Enjoy your day!''.

Belief State.action_fields: Message (Text input)
Belief State.action_fields_values: '☀️ Good morning! Today in London, it\'s going to be sunny with a high of 25°C. Enjoy your day!'

dialogue.System: So, you want a notification based on today’s weather report. To make this work smoothly, could you tell me at what time and for which location do you want to receive these updates?
dialogue.User: I'd like to know the weather every morning.

dialogue.User: I'd like something done whenever I save an article. Can you post it somewhere?

dialogue.System: Ok, so you want something done when you save an article. Where should I post it? And what about the source of the articles?
dialogue.User: Please post it on Twitter whenever a new item is saved on Pocket.

dialogue.System: Great! So any new item saved on Pocket will trigger a post on Twitter. Is there anything else I can help you with regarding this automation?
dialogue.User: No, that's all for now. There are no specific fields to configure for this rule.

dialogue.System: Okay, so you want to post a tweet with an image when a new item is saved on Pocket. What kind of content would you like included in this tweet?
dialogue.User: Just the link, I think. Maybe a short description too.

dialogue.System: Okay, you want me to post a tweet with an image when an article is saved on Pocket. You mentioned the item title being 'New article saved'. What details about this tweet would you like me to include besides the image?
dialogue.User: The action channel is Twitter and the action title is ‘Post a tweet with image’. I want to post a tweet with image when that happens, including the link and a short description of the item saved on Pocket with title 'New article saved'.

dialogue.System: Great! So you want to post a tweet with an image when a new article is saved on Pocket. What text would you like to accompany the image and link in your Tweet? And please confirm the Photo URL as well.
dialogue.User: The tweet should say 'Just saved an interesting article on Pocket! Check it out ➡️ [link to article]' and the photo URL is 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1503023345310-bd7c9bc5eb99?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8bGFuZHNjYXBlfGVufDB8fHx8MA%3D%3D'.

Belief State.action_fields: Tweet (Text input), Photo URL (Text input > Photo)
Belief State.action_fields_values: 'Just saved an interesting article on Pocket! Check it out ➡️ [link to article]', 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1503023345310-bd7c9bc5eb99?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8bGFuZHNjYXBlfGVufDB8fHx8MA%3D%3D'
